You can be pro gun AND pro gun control.
You can support Black Lives Matter AND your local police.
You can be religious AND support LGBT rights.
You can be patriotic AND criticize your government. . 
You can be pro-life AND pro-choice. 
You don't have to be just one thing.

But lives have been lost or turned upside down by gun violence. And many Americans believe Congress won’t do anything. 

We must act.
